character_set.description: character_set is the character set of the database.

cluster.description: cluster is the cluster of the database. This is only applicable to ClickHouse for "ON CLUSTER <<cluster>>".

collation.description: collation is the collation of the database.

database.description: The name of the database to create.

environment.description:
The environment resource.
 Format: environments/prod where prod is the environment resource ID.

owner.description: owner is the owner of the database. This is only applicable to Postgres for "WITH OWNER <<owner>>".

table.description:
table is the name of the table, if it is not empty, Bytebase should create a table after creating the database.
 For example, in MongoDB, it only creates the database when we first store data in that database.

target.description:
The resource name of the instance on which the database is created.
 Format: instances/{instance}
